 */import{UPDATE_NOMATCH}from"./NoMatch.action";/** @namespace Store/NoMatch/Reducer/getInitialState */export var getInitialState=middleware(function(){return{noMatch:false};},"Store/NoMatch/Reducer/getInitialState");/** @namespace Store/NoMatch/Reducer */export var NoMatchReducer=middleware(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:getInitialState();var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case UPDATE_NOMATCH:var noMatch=action.noMatch;return{noMatch:noMatch};default:return state;}},"Store/NoMatch/Reducer");export default NoMatchReducer;
